Name: Port Flip
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Old-school and something of a meal in a glass. Well, more of a tasty snack!
History: The "Port Wine Flip" first appears in Jerry Thomas' 1887 Bartender's Guide: How to Mix Drinks, or The Bon Vivant's Companion .
